nodes.name: Get Messages By Conversation ID GHL

parameters.toolDescription:
Updates or adds contact information in the CRM system. Use this tool whenever new or updated contact details are collected during the conversation.

Parameters:
- first_name (optional): The contact's first name
- last_name (optional): The contact's last name
- email (optional): The contact's email address
- phone (optional): The contact's phone number with country code
- business_name (optional): The name of the contact's business
- any additional custom fields you need to update
This is the add lead tag tool. Only use this tool to update the lead disposition as directed.

values.name: lead_disposition
values.description:
The updated lead disposition of the contact:

"not interested (text)" - when they explicitly say they're not interested
"warm lead (text)" - as soon as they reply and engage in conversation - default for any reply that isn't "not interested"
"hot lead (text)" - when they ask specific questions about our services or show clear interest in booking
"scheduled (text)" - after successfully sending the Deal Capacity Calculator or booking an appointment
